name: tebex-sdk-nodejs
description: Gaming payments done right - Tebex is the monetization platform designed to grow your gaming revenue streams

scripts.generate-headless: openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi/Headless/headless-api.yaml -o src/Headless/lib --package-name TebexHeadless --invoker-package TebexHeadless -g typescript-node
scripts.generate-checkout: openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi/Checkout/checkout-api.yaml -o src/Checkout/lib --package-name TebexCheckout --invoker-package TebexCheckout -g typescript-node
scripts.generate-sdks: npm run generate-headless && npm run generate-checkout
